arStrings.szText:
For the next {c_number}{s1}{/c} minutes:
{icon:bullet}Enemies have a chance to drop the Reward from any other Seething Opal on death.
{icon:bullet}Kills can grant reputation reputation for {c_yellow}Zakarum Remnants{/c}.
{icon:bullet} Experience gained is increased by {c_number}15%{/c}.
You may only have one Hate Fragment active at a time.
